solution_line_template: For every {kangaroos_per_koala} kangaroos, there is one koala, meaning for the {total_kangaroos} kangaroos, there are {total_kangaroos}/{kangaroos_per_koala} = <<{total_kangaroos}/{kangaroos_per_koala}={num_koalas}>>{num_koalas} koalas.
Altogether, there are {num_koalas}+{total_kangaroos} = <<{num_koalas}+{total_kangaroos}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} koalas and kangaroos.
